net.mobid.codetraq
Interface ITalker

All Known Implementing Classes:
EmailTalker, MSNTalker, XMPPTalker
public interface ITalker

Interface for notification mechanism.

Method Summary
 void addToContactList(java.lang.String recipientAddress)
          Adds the recipient address into internal contact list.
 void connect()
          Connects to notification server.
 void disconnect()
          Disconnects the connection to notification server
 boolean isInContactList(java.lang.String recipientAddress)
          Checks whether recipient is in the internal contact list.
 boolean recipientOnline(java.lang.String recipientAddress)
          Checks if a recipient is online and contactable.
 boolean talk(java.lang.String recipientAddress, java.lang.String message)
          Sends the message to recipient via notification mechanism.

talk

boolean talk(java.lang.String recipientAddress,
             java.lang.String message)
Sends the message to recipient via notification mechanism.

Parameters:
recipientAddress - - Notification recipient, the format depends on the implementation
message - - Message content
Returns:
true if message is sent successfully, false otherwise
